org.opends.sdk
Class AuthenticatedConnectionFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.opends.sdk.AuthenticatedConnectionFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectionFactory<AuthenticatedConnectionFactory.AuthenticatedAsynchronousConnection>
public final class AuthenticatedConnectionFactory
extends Object
implements ConnectionFactory<AuthenticatedConnectionFactory.AuthenticatedAsynchronousConnection>

An authenticated connection factory can be used to create pre-authenticated connections to a Directory Server.

The connections returned by an authenticated connection factory support all operations with the exception of Bind requests. Attempts to perform a Bind will result in an UnsupportedOperationException.

In addition, the returned connections support retrieval of the BindResult returned from the initial Bind request, or last rebind.

Support for connection re-authentication is provided through the setRebindAllowed(boolean) method which, if set to true, causes subsequent connections created using the factory to support the rebind method.

If the Bind request fails for some reason (e.g. invalid credentials), then the connection attempt will fail and an ErrorResultException will be thrown.

Nested Class Summary

          An authenticated asynchronous connection supports all operations except Bind operations.
static class AuthenticatedConnectionFactory.AuthenticatedConnection
          An authenticated synchronous connection supports all operations except Bind operations.

Constructor Detail

AuthenticatedConnectionFactory

public AuthenticatedConnectionFactory(ConnectionFactory<?> factory,
                                      BindRequest request)
                               throws NullPointerException
Creates a new authenticated connection factory which will obtain connections using the provided connection factory and immediately perform the provided Bind request.

Parameters:
factory - The connection factory to use for connecting to the Directory Server.
request - The Bind request to use for authentication.
Throws:
NullPointerException - If factory or request was null.
Method Detail

setRebindAllowed

public AuthenticatedConnectionFactory setRebindAllowed(boolean allowRebinds)
Specifies whether or not rebind requests are to be supported by connections created by this authenticated connection factory.

Rebind requests are invoked using the connection's rebind method which will throw an UnsupportedOperationException if rebinds are not supported (the default).

Parameters:
allowRebinds - true if the rebind operation is to be supported, otherwise false.
Returns:
A reference to this connection factory.

isRebindAllowed

public boolean isRebindAllowed()
Indicates whether or not rebind requests are to be supported by connections created by this authenticated connection factory.

Rebind requests are invoked using the connection's rebind method which will throw an UnsupportedOperationException if rebinds are not supported (the default).

Returns:
allowRebinds true if the rebind operation is to be supported, otherwise false.

getAsynchronousConnection

public <P> ConnectionFuture<AuthenticatedConnectionFactory.AuthenticatedAsynchronousConnection> getAsynchronousConnection(ConnectionResultHandler<? super AuthenticatedConnectionFactory.AuthenticatedAsynchronousConnection,P> handler,
                                                                                                                          P p)
Description copied from interface: ConnectionFactory
Initiates an asynchronous connection request to the Directory Server associated with this connection factory. The returned ConnectionFuture can be used to retrieve the completed asynchronous connection. Alternatively, if a ConnectionResultHandler is provided, the handler will be notified when the connection is available and ready for use.

Specified by:
getAsynchronousConnection in interface ConnectionFactory<AuthenticatedConnectionFactory.AuthenticatedAsynchronousConnection>
Type Parameters:
P - The type of the additional parameter to the handler's methods.
Parameters:
handler - The completion handler, or null if no handler is to be used.
p - Optional additional handler parameter.
Returns:
A future which can be used to retrieve the asynchronous connection.

getConnection

public AuthenticatedConnectionFactory.AuthenticatedConnection getConnection()
                                                                     throws ErrorResultException
Description copied from interface: ConnectionFactory
Returns a connection to the Directory Server associated with this connection factory. The connection returned by this method can be used immediately.

Specified by:
getConnection in interface ConnectionFactory<AuthenticatedConnectionFactory.AuthenticatedAsynchronousConnection>
Returns:
A connection to the Directory Server associated with this connection factory.
Throws:
ErrorResultException - If the connection request failed for some reason.
